hero.badge: Elegant Jewelry Crafted in Jalisco - Spring 2025 Collection
hero.title: Elegant Jewelry from the Heart of Jalisco
hero.description: Discover elegant jewelry designed in Guadalajara, Jalisco. Engagement rings, exclusive necklaces, bracelets, and earrings in 14k and 18k gold. Over 30 years creating unique pieces with Jalisco's artisan tradition. Secure shipping throughout Mexico.
hero.imageAlt: Elegant gold jewelry from Jalisco - Rings, necklaces, bracelets and earrings from Oro Nacional
